title: NullPointerException in RpcHandler
body:
### Description
`NullPointerException` reported from within `RpcHandler`.  Occurred while syncing, shortly after a restart.

```
20:19:14.684 ERROR - Unhandled error while processes req/response
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
    at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.p2p.libp2p.rpc.RpcHandler$Controller.channelRead0(RpcHandler.java:143) ~[teku-networking-p2p-0.12.2-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.2-dev-e64557e5
    at tech.pegasys.teku.networking.p2p.libp2p.rpc.RpcHandler$Controller.channelRead0(RpcHandler.java:118) ~[teku-networking-p2p-0.12.2-SNAPSHOT.jar:0.12.2-dev-e64557e5

    at io.libp2p.etc.util.netty.mux.AbstractMuxHandler.childRead(AbstractMuxHandler.kt:55) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.3-RELEASE.jar:?]
    at io.libp2p.mux.MuxHandler.channelRead(MuxHandler.kt:39) [jvm-libp2p-minimal-0.5.3-RELEASE.jar:?]

```
This looks like a duplicate of #2788 - closing this one in favour of that.
